mapper.select: select count(*) from program_plan where plan_always=0
select * from (select row_number() over(order by plan_start_date desc) no, p.* from program_plan p where plan_always=0) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList} order by no desc
select * from apply_state order by code
mapper.update: update applicant set state_code = #{state_code} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by id) no,a.* from(SELECT a.*,to_date(to_char(a.application_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')) apllication_date, s.state, p.plan_name from applicant a left outer join apply_state s on a.state_code=s.code left outer join program_plan p on a.plan_id=p.id order by a.id desc) a) where no between #{beginList} and #{endList} order by no desc
select * from program_plan where plan_always = 0 and id not in (select plan_id from notice where plan_id is not null) order by plan_start_date
select * from program_plan where plan_always = 0 and ( id not in (select plan_id from notice where plan_id is not null) or id = #{option} ) order by plan_start_date
select 10-nvl(sum(headcount),0) from applicant where plan_id = #{plan_id} and application_date = #{application_date} and plan_time = #{plan_time}
mapper.insert: insert into applicant ( name, phone, email, plan_id, headcount, application_date ) values( #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{plan_id}, #{headcount}, #{application_date} )
